title: Home Avenue
description: The author takes you back in time with four witty and inspirational tales. See how she ties together the past and the present to bring forth new perspectives on life. Don’t Blink — An entertaining, witty memory of a tour-group trip to Italy for seven Italian-American women from the same dysfunctional family.Hope Lies in Meatballs — How does someone grow up in an Italian family and not know how to cook? With a touch of cooking-story-humor, this tale will eventually have you tasting every delectable bite. Make sure you're not hungry.Home Avenue — It seems like every neighborhood has one of them…a mystery house.In the Bears Den with Dad — The Bears Den helped this daughter to overcome troubles at home and bullying at school. Includes an encounter with one of football’s greatest heroes.
author: L. Virelli
